.. figure:: gosper_gun.gif
    :width: 345
    :height: 439
    :align: center

    A "Gosper glider gun", named after Bill Gosper who discovered it in November 1970

==========
gameoflife
==========

This is a Python implementation of `Conway's Game of Life <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life>`_.
The purpose of this package is to serve as a template for learning how to
document and package Python code.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   classes
